description: Enhanced SupportFormModal to include current page URL in available URLs dropdown for better context in bug reports.
Added bug report functionality with BugReportButton integrated into header and mobile navigation, including URL tracking and support form modal.
Fixed iOS Safari dark mode support for gradient cards by adding specific CSS classes with important flags and updating documentation.
Enhanced About page layout with new AboutSidebar component and added features section showcasing Create Spot capabilities.
Fixed build errors in SubmissionLightbox and use-pinch-zoom hook components.
Updated SubmissionLightbox styles for improved mobile display with better overlay positioning and zoom state handling.
Added pinch-to-zoom functionality to SubmissionLightbox for mobile users with zoom percentage indicator and panning support.
